author: prbuzz.com
title: Visa-Vietnam.org assures Visa on Arrival Vietnam service with 100% Refund Guarantee
text:
Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam (prbuzz) October 9, 2015 - Visa-Vietnam.org has reportedly emerged as the one-stop portal for the advanced Visa on Arrival Vietnam service. They are recognized as the ideal company because of their trustworthy and good reviews. The company offers a 100% cash back guarantee on customer dissatisfaction.
“It certainly feels great to know that we are the go-to resource when it comes to Vietnam visa on arrival service for people from all over the globe. Unlike most of the unethical companies who wrongfully declare them as highly seasoned establishments- we are always truthful about our launch in the market & it’s our honesty and sincerity which have earned us the trust of so many customers. This is evident from the valuable reviews of our clients,” stated a senior official from Visa-Vietnam.org.
The leading VOA firm is a Vietnam government accredited company that was launched in 2007. The official assured reasonable prices with secured transaction facility. The Visa on Arrival Vietnam is a 3 step process where the customer would have to apply for the visa online on the Visa-Vietnam.org website. There is the option for 1 month single/multiple entry and 3 month single/multiple entries. After the payment is paid online, the company would send the VOA application to Vietnam Immigration for approval.
“We promise to get you the visa for Vietnam approval within 2-3 days and not more than that. Our prices are pretty reasonable and we have our own staff to conduct the entire process for you so that you can relax at home. If you want, we can even arrange for a rush visa,” added the Visa-Vietnam.org manager.
The company has arranged for a 26 percent discount policy for corporate members and up to 22 percent discount for the frequent members. He also added, “Customer convenience has always been a big watchword for us and our every approach is geared to that very principle. This is one of the main reasons why we are the VOA go-to portal today. In fact, we are ready for 100% refund if the visa application is denied by Vietnam Immigration or we make any error or you are not content with our service.”
About Visa-Vietnam.org
Visa-Vietnam.org is a leading Vietnam government accredited Visa on Arrival Vietnam company that has been offering VOA services to tourists all over the world at reasonable rates since 2007. For more details, visit http://www.visa-vietnam.org/
